analysis.description:
LockingContract.noteTokens (/unique_chucks/22/0xdd8c409d4b94de09bb6b6a898c74ad8149557aa8.sol#443-453) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(tokenBalance == totalTokens.add(_tokenAmount))

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/22/0xdd8c409d4b94de09bb6b6a898c74ad8149557aa8.sol:
	Contract ThinkCoin has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/22/0xdd8c409d4b94de09bb6b6a898c74ad8149557aa8.sol#404-405)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Crowdsale.approveMint (/unique_chucks/22/0xdd8c409d4b94de09bb6b6a898c74ad8149557aa8.sol#583-592) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/22/0xdd8c409d4b94de09bb6b6a898c74ad8149557aa8.sol#589-592)

Crowdsale.approveMintLocked (/unique_chucks/22/0xdd8c409d4b94de09bb6b6a898c74ad8149557aa8.sol#592-609) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(lockingContract,_tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/22/0xdd8c409d4b94de09bb6b6a898c74ad8149557aa8.sol#604-605)

Crowdsale.mintAllocation (/unique_chucks/22/0xdd8c409d4b94de09bb6b6a898c74ad8149557aa8.sol#609-617) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/22/0xdd8c409d4b94de09bb6b6a898c74ad8149557aa8.sol#614-615)

Crowdsale.finishMinting (/unique_chucks/22/0xdd8c409d4b94de09bb6b6a898c74ad8149557aa8.sol#617-619) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/22/0xdd8c409d4b94de09bb6b6a898c74ad8149557aa8.sol)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.Crowdsale (/unique_chucks/22/0xdd8c409d4b94de09bb6b6a898c74ad8149557aa8.sol#497-537):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(_saleCap <= _token.cap()) (/unique_chucks/22/0xdd8c409d4b94de09bb6b6a898c74ad8149557aa8.sol#520-521)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- approver (/unique_chucks/22/0xdd8c409d4b94de09bb6b6a898c74ad8149557aa8.sol#535)
	- lockingContract (/unique_chucks/22/0xdd8c409d4b94de09bb6b6a898c74ad8149557aa8.sol#526-531)
	- proposer (/unique_chucks/22/0xdd8c409d4b94de09bb6b6a898c74ad8149557aa8.sol#531-535)
	- saleCap (/unique_chucks/22/0xdd8c409d4b94de09bb6b6a898c74ad8149557aa8.sol#535)
	- saleEndTime (/unique_chucks/22/0xdd8c409d4b94de09bb6b6a898c74ad8149557aa8.sol#536)
	- saleStartTime (/unique_chucks/22/0xdd8c409d4b94de09bb6b6a898c74ad8149557aa8.sol#535-536)
	- token (/unique_chucks/22/0xdd8c409d4b94de09bb6b6a898c74ad8149557aa8.sol#526)

Reentrancy in LockingContract.noteTokens (/unique_chucks/22/0xdd8c409d4b94de09bb6b6a898c74ad8149557aa8.sol#443-453):
	External calls:
	- tokenBalance = tokenContract.balanceOf(this) (/unique_chucks/22/0xdd8c409d4b94de09bb6b6a898c74ad8149557aa8.sol#446)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokens (/unique_chucks/22/0xdd8c409d4b94de09bb6b6a898c74ad8149557aa8.sol#448-451)
	- totalTokens (/unique_chucks/22/0xdd8c409d4b94de09bb6b6a898c74ad8149557aa8.sol#451-452)

Reentrancy in LockingContract.releaseTokens (/unique_chucks/22/0xdd8c409d4b94de09bb6b6a898c74ad8149557aa8.sol#453-467):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(tokenContract.transfer(_beneficiary,amount)) (/unique_chucks/22/0xdd8c409d4b94de09bb6b6a898c74ad8149557aa8.sol#464-466)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalTokens (/unique_chucks/22/0xdd8c409d4b94de09bb6b6a898c74ad8149557aa8.sol#466-467)
